title: Stream: How To Dress Well – Total Loss
body:
It feels like I’ve been waiting for this record from the very second that I finished my premiere listen of **How To Dress Well’s** debut LP, **_Love Remains_**, back in 2010.

_**Total Loss**_ is a more mature and considered album, with increased continuity between tracks, yet still relying upon **Krell’s** minimal approach, replicating the transcendental nature of his first outing. Head to his [Official Website](http://howtodresswell.com/) to purchase _**Total Loss**_, and stream the record in it’s entirety below, as well as forthcoming tour dates.
